# baiducloud_appblb_ip_group (Resource)

Use this resource to manage Application LoadBalancer instance's IP group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "baiducloud_appblb_ip_group" "example" {
  blb_id = "blb-xxxxx"
  name   = "ip-group-example"
  desc   = "example ip group"

  backend_policy_list {
    type                = "HTTP"
    enable_health_check = true
    health_check        = "HTTP"
    health_check_port   = 80
    health_check_timeout_in_second  = 3
    health_check_interval_in_second = 3
    health_check_down_retry         = 3
    health_check_up_retry           = 3
    health_check_normal_status = "http_2xx|http_3xx"
    health_check_url_path      = "/"
  }

  member_list {
    ip     = "192.168.0.10"
    port   = 80
    weight = 80
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `blb_id` (String) ID of the Application LoadBalancer instance.

### Optional

- `backend_policy_list` (Block Set) Associated backend policy list of the IP group. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--backend_policy_list))
- `desc` (String) Description of the IP group. Maximum `200` characters.
- `member_list` (Block Set) Member list of the IP group. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--member_list))
- `name` (String) Name of the IP group. Maximum `65` characters, starts with a letter, may contain letters, digits, `-/.` characters. Auto-generated if not set.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--backend_policy_list"></a>
### Nested Schema for `backend_policy_list`

Required:

- `type` (String) Protocol type of the IP group policy. Valid values: `TCP`, `HTTP`, `HTTPS`, `UDP`.

Optional:

- `enable_health_check` (Boolean) Whether to enable health check. Default: `false`.
- `health_check` (String) Health check type. Defaults to policy type. Valid values: `TCP`, `HTTP`, `HTTPS`, `UDP`, `ICMP`. Allowed combinations: policy type `TCP` allows `TCP`; `UDP` allows `UDP`/`ICMP`; `HTTP` allows `TCP`/`HTTP`; `HTTPS` allows `TCP`/`HTTP`/`HTTPS`.
- `health_check_down_retry` (Number) Unhealthy threshold. Number of consecutive failed health checks before marking the backend as unavailable. Range `2-5`. Default: `3`.
- `health_check_host` (String) Host header for L7 health checks (for example, `localhost`). Effective when health check type is `HTTP`.
- `health_check_interval_in_second` (Number) Health check interval in seconds. Range `1-10`. Default: `3`.
- `health_check_normal_status` (String) Health check normal status for HTTP checks. Supported values: `http_2xx`, `http_3xx`, `http_4xx`, `http_5xx`, or a `|`-separated combination (for example, `http_2xx|http_3xx`). Default: `http_2xx|http_3xx`. Effective when health check type is `HTTP`.
- `health_check_port` (Number) Health check port. Required when policy type is `HTTP` or `HTTPS`. Range `1-65535`.
- `health_check_timeout_in_second` (Number) Health check timeout in seconds. Range `1-60`. Default: `3`.
- `health_check_up_retry` (Number) Healthy threshold. Number of consecutive successful health checks before marking the backend as available. Range `2-5`. Default: `3`.
- `health_check_url_path` (String) Health check URL path. Default: `/`. Effective when health check type is `HTTP`.
- `udp_health_check_string` (String) UDP health check string. Required when health check type is `UDP`.

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Backend policy ID of the IP group.


<a id="nestedblock--member_list"></a>
### Nested Schema for `member_list`

Required:

- `ip` (String) IPv4 address.
- `port` (Number) Port number. Range `1-65535`.
- `weight` (Number) Weight. Range `0-100`.

Read-Only:

- `member_id` (String) IP group member ID.
